text: (Napiyē!) Yūtarkaḷum, kiṟistavarkaḷum avarkaḷ vaḻiyai nīr piṉpaṟṟātavaraiyil um'maippaṟṟi tiruptiyaṭaiya māṭṭārkaḷ. (Ākavē, avarkaḷai nōkki;)"niccayamāka allāhviṉ vaḻi-(islām) atuvē nērvaḻi" eṉṟu collum;. Aṉṟi ñāṉam um'mai vantaṭainta piṉṉarum avarkaḷuṭaiya iccaikaḷaip piṉpaṟṟuvīrēyāṉāl, allāhviṭamiruntu um'maik kāppāṟṟupavaṉum, umakku utavi ceypavaṉum illai
